page.title: 17A Day in My Life in Thorney
page.content: It's about{7.15}when mum calls me to get up. I always get up sleepy, but I soon liven up. I then have a wash and get ready for school. When I have done that it is about{7.45.}At{8.00}our next door neighbour comes round for a cup of coffee with my mum. While they natter in the kitchen I go in the living-room and watch TV. I always watch 'Popeye'. When my next door neighbour goes it is{8.20.}About then my mum has to go to work, and I have to stay on my own. When she goes I'm still watching T.V and at{8.40}I go to school. I only have to cross the road and I'm in school. When I get in school I play for about 10 minutes and then the bell goes. As soon as I get in I take my coat off and go in for assembly. After that we usually have an hour of maths. By then it is time for break.
